oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Poles and zeros - examples of the behavioral approach applied to discrete linear repetitive processes
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ROGERS, E
ZARIS, PM
WOOD, J
PILLAI, H
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: systems
stability
repetitive processes
behavioral approach
poles and zeros
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper the behavorial approach is applied to discrete linear repetitive processes, which are class of 2D systems of both systems theoretic and applications interest. The main results are on poles and zeros for these processes, which have exponential trajectory interpretations.
